Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Minimize]: Minimize the Recolor panel to save space.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Expand]: Expands the Recolor panel for use.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[CopyColor]: Copy a single color to paste later.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[PasteColor]: Paste a single color as part of a color set.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[ResetColor]: Reset a single color and saves the color back to the original color for this asset (and season, if applicable).
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[CopyColorSet: Copy the whole color set to paste later.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[ResetColorSe: Reset the whole color set and saves the colors back to the original colors for this asset (and season, if applicable).
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[ResetInstanc: Resets the instance colors and this instance will return to utilizing its color variation.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[SaveToDisk]: Saves the color variation to ModsData folder so that it can be used as default across multiple saves.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[RemoveFromDi: Removes the saved color variation from ModsData folder so that it no longer is used across multiple saves.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[SingleInstan: Change the colors of the current selection only.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Matching]: Change the colors of all assets with the same mesh, color variation (and season, if applicable). Single Instance will override this for that instance.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[SingleSelect: Changes the colors of one buildings, prop, or vehicle.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[RadiusSelect: Changes the single instance colors of buildings, prop, and/or vehicles within the radius.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[BuildingFilt: Color Painter tool will change single instance colors of buildings.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[PropFilter]: Color Painter tool will change single instance colors of props.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[VehicleFilte: Color Painter tool will change single instance colors of vehicles.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[PaintToolMod: Changes single instance colors or matching color variations on a selection.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[ResetToolMod: Resets single instance colors back to color variation or custom color variations back to originals.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[PickerToolMo: Color picker within the painter tool.
Options.OPTION[Recolor.Recolor.Mod.Setti: Automatically Copy Color Set when activating Color Painter
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Recolor.Recol: Copies and pastes the set of three colors from the selected asset whenever color painter is activated from the selected info panel button.
Upon confirmation this will reset all settings for Recolor mod.
Version number for the Recolor mod installed.
Options.OPTION[Recolor.Recolor.Mod.Setti: Reset All Single Instance Color Changes
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Recolor.Recol: Upon confirmation resets all instance colors in this save file.
Options.WARNING[Recolor.Recolor.Mod.Sett: Reset All Single Instance Color Changes?
Options.OPTION[Recolor.Recolor.Mod.Setti: Reset Color Variations in this Save Game
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Recolor.Recol: Upon confirmation removes all saved color variations from this save file.
Options.WARNING[Recolor.Recolor.Mod.Sett: Reset Color Variations in this Save Game?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Recolor.Recol: Upon confirmation deletes all saved files in ModsData related to this mod.

Upon confirmation this will remove all components and entities from the Recolor mod. Resets all instance colors in this save file, remove all saved color variations from this save file, and delete all saved files in ModsData related to this mod.
A keybind to activate the color painter tool.
Upon confirmation this will reset the keybindings for Recolor mod.
Recolor.MOUSE_TOOLTIP[SingleInstancePlan: Single instance color changes for plants is not currently supported.
Recolor.MOUSE_TOOLTIP[HasCustomMeshColor: Cannot change color variation on this because it has custom instance colors.
